title: Type for you
content:
Hello!  
Just to let you know of my blog over at [Type for you](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015151317/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20for%20you) [www.typeforyou.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015151317/http:/www.typeforyou.org/ "www.typeforyou.org") (or typeforyou.blogspot.com).  
Updated almost everyday with news and articles about type (mainly).  
I´m working on a new design for it, anyway I hope you like it...  
Please write any sugestions or comments. Thank you! :)
author: pedroserrao

comments.content:
I really love the people like you.

thank you sooo much.

satya

Thank you Satya for your kind words :)

Pedro.
